name: Promotion Class: Slayer
description:
Role: Ranged Damage

A master of pistols who enhances their powers when dealing critical strikes.

Stat Adjustments:
Attack Power +150
Critical Strike +6%

Traits Granted:
Pistol Mastery
Rapier Mastery

Enhancements:
Pepperbox Shot: Now deals 50% more damage.
Keen Guard: Now adds a Critical Strike buff that scales with pips.
Flintlock Shot: Now generates an additional pip when used and has a chance to have it's cooldown reset when using Basic Saber Attacks and Pistol Shots.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Slayer promotion class and prevents access to the Vanguard Scout  and Dirge  promotion classes.
